title: Technology-Integrated Education Through Music: Convergence of Emotion and Cognition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory (understanding of rhythm, melody, harmony) and basic smartphone app usage
context.additional_context: Project-based music production class using smartphone-based tools (e.g., MuseScore mobile version) in limited-technology environments (no PC access)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze musical works and explain emotional expression techniques (tempo, timbre, harmony).
Learners can compose simple melodies and arrange instrumental tracks using smartphone applications.
Learners can produce learning outcomes reflecting the interaction between technology and music based on the TPCK framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
